projects.title: FloatChat - AI-Powered ARGO Ocean Data Explorer
projects.description: Live production dashboard democratizing access to complex ARGO oceanographic data through conversational AI. Features end-to-end RAG pipeline with Qwen LLM, Nomic Embeddings, and ChromaDB vector store for natural language queries. Includes interactive mapping, T-S diagrams, BGC parameter analysis, and multi-format export capabilities.

projects.title: Sofia - AI Chatbot for Live Document Insights
projects.description: Azure-based production AI chatbot providing real-time Q&A over internal policy documents with semantic search and inline citations. Features end-to-end pipeline with Azure OpenAI for query enhancement, Cognitive Search for semantic retrieval, and React/Next.js frontend with citation management system.
